author: Joe Gilmore
description: A Wet Martini served on the rocks, sweetened and flavoured with a slug of cognac orange liqueur.
name: Lorraine (by Joe Gilmore)
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass (preferably offer a large cube or chunk of block ice)
